data.title: McLean Stevenson Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about McLean Stevenson on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature McLean Stevenson including M*A*S*H and The Doris Day Show.
data.text:
Brotherly Love

Blanche makes a move at Ted, Stan's brother the minute she learns he's a neurosurgeon. She is furious when she discovers the only woman Ted is apparently interested in is Dorothy. Meanwhile, Rose is suffering from insomnia.

The Best Of George Carlin

Carlin talks about going on vacation after months on the road, and Johnny chats with Gene Hackman, Mclean Stevenson and Gloria De Haven.

My Sister's Keeper

While working on a commercial, Ann's voice is dubbed by a singer that she finds to be fantastic. But her efforts to give this young woman a boost in her career may not go so well, when she finds the young woman has a higher calling.

Comic Legends Of The '60s - Buddy Hackett

Learn how to raise rabbits on a Brooklyn fire escape with Buddy Hackett and how to light a fire with Brady Watt. Also appearing are McLean Stevenson and John Kidner.

The Johnny Carson Show: Comic Legends Of The '70s - George Carlin (2/15/77)

George Carlin sticks only to words you CAN say on TV. Plus, Rita Reutter is an older sex symbol, McLean Stevenson had a date with the Rose Bowl Queen and Martina Navratilova is the best tennis player in the world.
